<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-selectiondag-cpp-/rauovwupdatelistener">RAUOVWUpdateListener</a> - Helper for ReplaceAllUsesOfValuesWith - When the node pointed to by a <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-selectiondag-cpp-/usememo">UseMemo</a> is deleted, set the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> to nullptr to indicate that the node already has been taken care of recursively. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-selectiondag-cpp-/rauovwupdatelistener">RAUOVWUpdateListener</a> - Helper for ReplaceAllUsesOfValuesWith - When the node pointed to by a <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-selectiondag-cpp-/usememo">UseMemo</a> is deleted, set the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> to nullptr to indicate that the node already has been taken care of recursively.
